00179     function replaceEntities($string, $replaceEntities = XML_UTIL_ENTITIES_XML,
00180         $encoding = 'ISO-8859-1')
00181     {
00182         switch ($replaceEntities) {
00183         case XML_UTIL_ENTITIES_XML:
00184             return strtr($string, array(
00185                 '&'  => '&amp;',
00186                 '>'  => '&gt;',
00187                 '<'  => '&lt;',
00188                 '"'  => '&quot;',
00189                 '\'' => '&apos;' ));
00190             break;
00191         case XML_UTIL_ENTITIES_XML_REQUIRED:
00192             return strtr($string, array(
00193                 '&' => '&amp;',
00194                 '<' => '&lt;',
00195                 '"' => '&quot;' ));
00196             break;
00197         case XML_UTIL_ENTITIES_HTML:
00198             return htmlentities($string, ENT_COMPAT, $encoding);
00199             break;
00200         }
00201         return $string;
00202     }

00245     function reverseEntities($string, $replaceEntities = XML_UTIL_ENTITIES_XML,
00246         $encoding = 'ISO-8859-1')
00247     {
00248         switch ($replaceEntities) {
00249         case XML_UTIL_ENTITIES_XML:
00250             return strtr($string, array(
00251                 '&amp;'  => '&',
00252                 '&gt;'   => '>',
00253                 '&lt;'   => '<',
00254                 '&quot;' => '"',
00255                 '&apos;' => '\'' ));
00256             break;
00257         case XML_UTIL_ENTITIES_XML_REQUIRED:
00258             return strtr($string, array(
00259                 '&amp;'  => '&',
00260                 '&lt;'   => '<',
00261                 '&quot;' => '"' ));
00262             break;
00263         case XML_UTIL_ENTITIES_HTML:
00264             return html_entity_decode($string, ENT_COMPAT, $encoding);
00265             break;
00266         }
00267         return $string;
00268     }

00289     function getXMLDeclaration($version = '1.0', $encoding = null, 
00290         $standalone = null)
00291     {
00292         $attributes = array(
00293             'version' => $version,
00294         );
00295         // add encoding
00296         if ($encoding !== null) {
00297             $attributes['encoding'] = $encoding;
00298         }
00299         // add standalone, if specified
00300         if ($standalone !== null) {
00301             $attributes['standalone'] = $standalone ? 'yes' : 'no';
00302         }
00303 
00304         return sprintf('<?xml%s?>', 
00305             XML_Util::attributesToString($attributes, false));
00306     }

00328     function getDocTypeDeclaration($root, $uri = null, $internalDtd = null)
00329     {
00330         if (is_array($uri)) {
00331             $ref = sprintf(' PUBLIC "%s" "%s"', $uri['id'], $uri['uri']);
00332         } elseif (!empty($uri)) {
00333             $ref = sprintf(' SYSTEM "%s"', $uri);
00334         } else {
00335             $ref = '';
00336         }
00337 
00338         if (empty($internalDtd)) {
00339             return sprintf('<!DOCTYPE %s%s>', $root, $ref);
00340         } else {
00341             return sprintf("<!DOCTYPE %s%s [\n%s\n]>", $root, $ref, $internalDtd);
00342         }
00343     }

00383     function attributesToString($attributes, $sort = true, $multiline = false, 
00384         $indent = '    ', $linebreak = "\n", $entities = XML_UTIL_ENTITIES_XML)
00385     {
00386         /*
00387          * second parameter may be an array
00388          */
00389         if (is_array($sort)) {
00390             if (isset($sort['multiline'])) {
00391                 $multiline = $sort['multiline'];
00392             }
00393             if (isset($sort['indent'])) {
00394                 $indent = $sort['indent'];
00395             }
00396             if (isset($sort['linebreak'])) {
00397                 $multiline = $sort['linebreak'];
00398             }
00399             if (isset($sort['entities'])) {
00400                 $entities = $sort['entities'];
00401             }
00402             if (isset($sort['sort'])) {
00403                 $sort = $sort['sort'];
00404             } else {
00405                 $sort = true;
00406             }
00407         }
00408         $string = '';
00409         if (is_array($attributes) && !empty($attributes)) {
00410             if ($sort) {
00411                 ksort($attributes);
00412             }
00413             if ( !$multiline || count($attributes) == 1) {
00414                 foreach ($attributes as $key => $value) {
00415                     if ($entities != XML_UTIL_ENTITIES_NONE) {
00416                         if ($entities === XML_UTIL_CDATA_SECTION) {
00417                             $entities = XML_UTIL_ENTITIES_XML;
00418                         }
00419                         $value = XML_Util::replaceEntities($value, $entities);
00420                     }
00421                     $string .= ' ' . $key . '="' . $value . '"';
00422                 }
00423             } else {
00424                 $first = true;
00425                 foreach ($attributes as $key => $value) {
00426                     if ($entities != XML_UTIL_ENTITIES_NONE) {
00427                         $value = XML_Util::replaceEntities($value, $entities);
00428                     }
00429                     if ($first) {
00430                         $string .= ' ' . $key . '="' . $value . '"';
00431                         $first   = false;
00432                     } else {
00433                         $string .= $linebreak . $indent . $key . '="' . $value . '"';
00434                     }
00435                 }
00436             }
00437         }
00438         return $string;
00439     }

00454     function collapseEmptyTags($xml, $mode = XML_UTIL_COLLAPSE_ALL) 
00455     {
00456         if ($mode == XML_UTIL_COLLAPSE_XHTML_ONLY) {
00457             return preg_replace(
00458                 '/<(area|base(?:font)?|br|col|frame|hr|img|input|isindex|link|meta|'
00459                 . 'param)([^>]*)><\/\\1>/s',
00460                 '<\\1\\2 />',
00461                 $xml);
00462         } else {
00463             return preg_replace('/<(\w+)([^>]*)><\/\\1>/s', '<\\1\\2 />', $xml);
00464         }
00465     }

00504     function createTag($qname, $attributes = array(), $content = null, 
00505         $namespaceUri = null, $replaceEntities = XML_UTIL_REPLACE_ENTITIES, 
00506         $multiline = false, $indent = '_auto', $linebreak = "\n", 
00507         $sortAttributes = true)
00508     {
00509         $tag = array(
00510             'qname'      => $qname,
00511             'attributes' => $attributes
00512         );
00513 
00514         // add tag content
00515         if ($content !== null) {
00516             $tag['content'] = $content;
00517         }
00518 
00519         // add namespace Uri
00520         if ($namespaceUri !== null) {
00521             $tag['namespaceUri'] = $namespaceUri;
00522         }
00523 
00524         return XML_Util::createTagFromArray($tag, $replaceEntities, $multiline, 
00525             $indent, $linebreak, $sortAttributes);
00526     }
00527 
00587     function createTagFromArray($tag, $replaceEntities = XML_UTIL_REPLACE_ENTITIES,
00588         $multiline = false, $indent = '_auto', $linebreak = "\n", 
00589         $sortAttributes = true)
00590     {
00591         if (isset($tag['content']) && !is_scalar($tag['content'])) {
00592             return XML_Util::raiseError('Supplied non-scalar value as tag content',
00593             XML_UTIL_ERROR_NON_SCALAR_CONTENT);
00594         }
00595 
00596         if (!isset($tag['qname']) && !isset($tag['localPart'])) {
00597             return XML_Util::raiseError('You must either supply a qualified name '
00598                 . '(qname) or local tag name (localPart).', 
00599                 XML_UTIL_ERROR_NO_TAG_NAME);
00600         }
00601 
00602         // if no attributes hav been set, use empty attributes
00603         if (!isset($tag['attributes']) || !is_array($tag['attributes'])) {
00604             $tag['attributes'] = array();
00605         }
00606 
00607         if (isset($tag['namespaces'])) {
00608             foreach ($tag['namespaces'] as $ns => $uri) {
00609                 $tag['attributes']['xmlns:' . $ns] = $uri;
00610             }
00611         }
00612 
00613         if (!isset($tag['qname'])) {
00614             // qualified name is not given
00615 
00616             // check for namespace
00617             if (isset($tag['namespace']) && !empty($tag['namespace'])) {
00618                 $tag['qname'] = $tag['namespace'] . ':' . $tag['localPart'];
00619             } else {
00620                 $tag['qname'] = $tag['localPart'];
00621             }
00622         } elseif (isset($tag['namespaceUri']) && !isset($tag['namespace'])) {
00623             // namespace URI is set, but no namespace
00624 
00625             $parts = XML_Util::splitQualifiedName($tag['qname']);
00626 
00627             $tag['localPart'] = $parts['localPart'];
00628             if (isset($parts['namespace'])) {
00629                 $tag['namespace'] = $parts['namespace'];
00630             }
00631         }
00632 
00633         if (isset($tag['namespaceUri']) && !empty($tag['namespaceUri'])) {
00634             // is a namespace given
00635             if (isset($tag['namespace']) && !empty($tag['namespace'])) {
00636                 $tag['attributes']['xmlns:' . $tag['namespace']] =
00637                     $tag['namespaceUri'];
00638             } else {
00639                 // define this Uri as the default namespace
00640                 $tag['attributes']['xmlns'] = $tag['namespaceUri'];
00641             }
00642         }
00643 
00644         // check for multiline attributes
00645         if ($multiline === true) {
00646             if ($indent === '_auto') {
00647                 $indent = str_repeat(' ', (strlen($tag['qname'])+2));
00648             }
00649         }
00650 
00651         // create attribute list
00652         $attList = XML_Util::attributesToString($tag['attributes'], 
00653             $sortAttributes, $multiline, $indent, $linebreak, $replaceEntities);
00654         if (!isset($tag['content']) || (string)$tag['content'] == '') {
00655             $tag = sprintf('<%s%s />', $tag['qname'], $attList);
00656         } else {
00657             switch ($replaceEntities) {
00658             case XML_UTIL_ENTITIES_NONE:
00659                 break;
00660             case XML_UTIL_CDATA_SECTION:
00661                 $tag['content'] = XML_Util::createCDataSection($tag['content']);
00662                 break;
00663             default:
00664                 $tag['content'] = XML_Util::replaceEntities($tag['content'], 
00665                     $replaceEntities);
00666                 break;
00667             }
00668             $tag = sprintf('<%s%s>%s</%s>', $tag['qname'], $attList, $tag['content'],
00669                 $tag['qname']);
00670         }
00671         return $tag;
00672     }

00700     function createStartElement($qname, $attributes = array(), $namespaceUri = null,
00701         $multiline = false, $indent = '_auto', $linebreak = "\n", 
00702         $sortAttributes = true)
00703     {
00704         // if no attributes hav been set, use empty attributes
00705         if (!isset($attributes) || !is_array($attributes)) {
00706             $attributes = array();
00707         }
00708 
00709         if ($namespaceUri != null) {
00710             $parts = XML_Util::splitQualifiedName($qname);
00711         }
00712 
00713         // check for multiline attributes
00714         if ($multiline === true) {
00715             if ($indent === '_auto') {
00716                 $indent = str_repeat(' ', (strlen($qname)+2));
00717             }
00718         }
00719 
00720         if ($namespaceUri != null) {
00721             // is a namespace given
00722             if (isset($parts['namespace']) && !empty($parts['namespace'])) {
00723                 $attributes['xmlns:' . $parts['namespace']] = $namespaceUri;
00724             } else {
00725                 // define this Uri as the default namespace
00726                 $attributes['xmlns'] = $namespaceUri;
00727             }
00728         }
00729 
00730         // create attribute list
00731         $attList = XML_Util::attributesToString($attributes, $sortAttributes, 
00732             $multiline, $indent, $linebreak);
00733         $element = sprintf('<%s%s>', $qname, $attList);
00734         return  $element;
00735     }

00754     function createEndElement($qname)
00755     {
00756         $element = sprintf('</%s>', $qname);
00757         return $element;
00758     }

00776     function createComment($content)

00778         $comment = sprintf('<!-- %s -->', $content);
00779         return $comment;

00798     function createCDataSection($data)
00799     {
00800         return sprintf('<![CDATA[%s]]>', 
00801             preg_replace('/\]\]>/', ']]]]><![CDATA[>', strval($data)));
00802 
00803     }

00829     function splitQualifiedName($qname, $defaultNs = null)
00830     {
00831         if (strstr($qname, ':')) {
00832             $tmp = explode(':', $qname);
00833             return array(
00834                 'namespace' => $tmp[0],
00835                 'localPart' => $tmp[1]
00836             );
00837         }
00838         return array(
00839             'namespace' => $defaultNs,
00840             'localPart' => $qname
00841         );
00842     }
00843 
00871     function isValidName($string)
00872     {
00873         // check for invalid chars
00874         if (!preg_match('/^[[:alpha:]_]$/', $string{0})) {
00875             return XML_Util::raiseError('XML names may only start with letter '
00876                 . 'or underscore', XML_UTIL_ERROR_INVALID_START);
00877         }
00878 
00879         // check for invalid chars
00880         if (!preg_match('/^([[:alpha:]_]([[:alnum:]\-\.]*)?:)?[[:alpha:]_]([[:alnum:]\_\-\.]+)?$/',
00881             $string)
00882         ) {
00883             return XML_Util::raiseError('XML names may only contain alphanumeric '
00884                 . 'chars, period, hyphen, colon and underscores', 
00885                 XML_UTIL_ERROR_INVALID_CHARS);
00886         }
00887         // XML name is valid
00888         return true;
00889     }

00905     function raiseError($msg, $code)
00906     {
00907         require_once 'PEAR.php';
00908         return PEAR::raiseError($msg, $code);
00909     }
